Greetings, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],\n\nMother Lilith has decided it is time for a foreign ruler to be awakened to the power of the Chosen. She has commanded you to seduce [dw_seduce_ruler_target.GetHerHim] and bring [dw_seduce_ruler_target.GetHerHis] the sweet taste of sex.
Grandmother Lilith's Court

You retire to bed, praying for Lilith to grant you power or guidance. You have accomplished much in her name, and await the day you can feel her favor running through your body. Your eyes close, drifting off into a deep slumber.

  When you awake, you find yourself... elsewhere. A stately throneroom, the court comprised of demons of all types. Most are engaged in an orgy with each other. All except one... a beautiful, nude queen sitting atop her throne. You know who this is.
  "Welcome to my court, [Root.GetFirstName]," she nonchalantly mutters, surveying the sex-fueled scene before her. As if already bored of the orgy, the demon queen gets up off of her throne and moves toward you, her eyes locked on to you with lust. "You have done very, very well for yourself." Lilith licks her lips and runs her hands down her lithe body. "Allow me to reward you for your actions."
  Just as you about to reach out to embrace the woman, Lilith stops you with a finger to your lips. "Ah ah," she chastises, "you have not yet earned the right. For now, however, you have earned my lineage." With a sudden movement, Lilith thrusts her hand through your ribcage to grasp your heart. And yet... there is no pain, only unending lust for the woman. This lust grows stronger with each beat of your heart, until eventually Lilith pulls her hand back out of your chest.
  You feel... changed, somehow. "You are now one of us, my darling grand[Root.GetSonDaughter]. Continue to serve me well, and I might share my body with you." Your new 'grandmother' leans in and places a small kiss on your lips, a kiss that shocks you back into reality.

  You are back in your bed, covered in a cold sweat. And yet... something is different about you. You can feel the demonic blood flowing through your veins.
Thank you, grandmother.
Mother Lilith's Court
